column4: hi, I'm trying to put together a video using PiTiVi, however, a video clip is in an unsupported format. What's the best way to convert this to a usable one? I've tried vlc and mencoder but then just produce broken, unusable results. Thanks in advance
what format is the video clip in, then?
I agree with solid_liq, handbrake first. Failing that, ffmpeg or transcode
